title: Activating Assistant With Active Edge While in My Pocket for Bluetooth
content:
I have Active Edge set up and it works as expected, except when it is in my pocket. I use bluetooth headphones and would like to be able to activate the Assistant that way so I can ask through my headphones

I suppose it is because the radar is covered up, because just simply turning the phone over on a surface prevents Active edge from working
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
